snippet.title: Genfanad | Kickstarter Launch Trailer!
snippet.description:
Genfanad has now launched on Kickstarter! Go over and support us (and don't miss those cool early bird rewards, they won't last forever!)
👉 Support us on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/rosetintedgames/genfanad
👉 Join our Mailing List: http://bit.ly/3FyYRZP

Heroes, we need you! Our world has too many jobs that need doing and not enough willing suckers to do them. Chop wood! Craft slightly better weapons! Go fishing! (When we remember to add fish.) Oh and if you REALLY must fight scary demons, we've got some dungeons that need clearing out…

👉 Wishlist on Steam TODAY: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1976290/Genfanad_A_Generic_Fantasy_Adventure/?curator_clanid=4777282&utm_source=SteamDB

👉 Join our Discord and receive updates!
discord.com/invite/Kyf9u7x
